body_html:
The whl file was compiled on an Ubuntu 16.04 system with glibc 2.22. I'm asking around if there is a way to compile it for an older version of glibc.

For the message:

Invalid path to cuDNN 7 toolkit. None of the following files can be found:
/autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/cuda/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib64/libcudnn.so.7

it is looking for a lib64 (and not the lib directory) for libcudnn.so.7. Maybe symlink lib64 to lib?

The whl file was compiled on an Ubuntu 16.04 system with glibc 2.22. I'm asking around if there is a way to compile it for an older version of glibc. 

For the message:
```
Invalid path to cuDNN 7 toolkit. None of the following files can be found:
/autofs/nccs-svm1_home1/shubhankar/cuda/targets/ppc64le-linux/lib64/libcudnn.so.7
```
it is looking for a lib64 (and not the lib directory) for libcudnn.so.7. Maybe symlink lib64 to lib?
